head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths KLEIN, SIDNEY B.

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths KLEIN, SIDNEY B.

block.p: KLEIN-Sidney B. We mourn the loss of the beloved husband of Nancy Klein, past National President and Educational Director, and son-in-law of past President, Elizabeth Gilbert. Devoted husband, father, grandfather, ardent communal leader, a blessing to all. Sophie Ebert, National President Women's Branch Orthodox Union
